projects.title: My Flight - Delta Airlines Crew App
projects.description: Enterprise iOS application empowering 25,000+ Delta Airlines flight attendants and pilots with real-time schedule management, offline-first architecture, and mission-critical reliability.
projects.fullDescription:
## Overview

My Flight is Delta Airlines' flagship crew management application, serving as the digital command center for thousands of flight attendants and pilots. Built with cutting-edge SwiftUI and MVVM architecture, the app delivers a seamless experience even at 35,000 feet.

## Key Achievements

- **Scale**: Supporting 25,000+ active crew members across global operations
- **Reliability**: 99.9% uptime with robust offline-first architecture
- **Performance**: Sub-second load times with optimized Core Data implementation
- **User Satisfaction**: 4.8★ App Store rating with 10K+ reviews

## Technical Highlights

- **Offline-First Architecture**: Full functionality without internet connectivity using Core Data and intelligent sync strategies
- **Real-Time Updates**: WebSocket integration for live schedule changes and notifications
- **SwiftUI + Combine**: Modern reactive UI with declarative syntax
- **Security**: End-to-end encryption for sensitive crew information
- **Accessibility**: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant with VoiceOver support

## Features

- **Smart Schedule Management**: AI-powered schedule optimization and conflict detection
- **Position Assignment**: Dynamic crew positioning with real-time updates
- **Document Hub**: Secure access to flight manuals, safety procedures, and company policies
- **Meal Management**: Pre-order crew meals with dietary preferences
- **Offline Mode**: Complete functionality without network connectivity
- **Push Notifications**: Critical updates for schedule changes and gate assignments

## Impact

Reduced crew scheduling conflicts by 40% and improved operational efficiency, saving Delta Airlines an estimated $2M annually in crew coordination costs.

projects.title: Kitaboo - Multi-Platform eBook SDK
projects.description: Revolutionary SDK powering digital reading experiences for 10M+ users across iOS, Android, React Native, and Flutter. The engine behind leading EdTech platforms worldwide.
projects.fullDescription:
## Overview

Kitaboo SDK is a comprehensive, plug-and-play solution for rendering digital books across multiple platforms. As the lead architect, I designed and built this SDK from the ground up, transforming it into a product serving millions of students and educators globally.

## Scale & Impact

- **10M+ Active Users**: Powering reading experiences for students worldwide
- **Multi-Platform**: Single codebase supporting iOS, Android, React Native, and Flutter
- **50+ Client Integrations**: Adopted by major EdTech companies and publishers
- **99.95% Uptime**: Enterprise-grade reliability and performance

## Technical Architecture

### Core Engine
- **Format Support**: EPUB 2/3, PDF, Audio Books, Video Books, Interactive Content
- **Rendering Engine**: Custom-built high-performance renderer with hardware acceleration
- **Memory Optimization**: Efficient pagination with lazy loading (handles 1000+ page books)
- **Cross-Platform**: Shared business logic with platform-specific UI layers

### Advanced Features
- **Annotation System**: Highlights, bookmarks, notes, pen tool, voice notes
- **Search**: Full-text search with fuzzy matching and instant results
- **Accessibility**: Screen reader support, adjustable fonts, dyslexia-friendly modes
- **Offline-First**: Complete functionality without internet
- **Sync**: Cloud synchronization of reading progress and annotations
- **Analytics**: Reading behavior tracking and engagement metrics

## Developer Experience

```swift
// Simple integration - just a few lines of code
let reader = KitabooReader(config: config)
reader.openBook(bookId: "123")
reader.delegate = self
```

### SDK Features
- **Modular Architecture**: Use only what you need
- **Customizable UI**: Complete theming and branding support
- **Extensive Documentation**: Comprehensive guides and API references
- **Sample Apps**: Ready-to-use examples for all platforms
- **Active Support**: Dedicated developer support team

## Performance Metrics

- **Load Time**: < 2 seconds for 500-page books
- **Memory Footprint**: < 50MB for typical usage
- **Battery Efficiency**: Optimized for all-day reading
- **Smooth Scrolling**: 60 FPS on all supported devices

## Recognition

Awarded 'Best EdTech Innovation' at Mobile Tech Summit 2021. Featured in multiple case studies for successful SDK architecture and developer adoption.

projects.title: MaxxMobile - Enterprise Document Management
projects.description: Secure, cloud-connected document management system enabling seamless collaboration and workflow automation for enterprise teams on iOS.
projects.fullDescription:
## Overview

MaxxMobile brings enterprise document management to iOS, enabling teams to access, edit, and collaborate on documents from anywhere. Integrated with MaxxCloud, the app provides a complete mobile document workflow solution.

## Core Capabilities

### Document Management
- **Universal Access**: View and edit all documents from MaxxCloud repository
- **Format Support**: PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and more
- **Offline Mode**: Download documents for offline access with automatic sync
- **Version Control**: Track document history and restore previous versions
- **Search**: Full-text search across all documents with filters

### Collaboration Features
- **Real-Time Editing**: Collaborative editing with conflict resolution
- **Comments & Annotations**: Add notes, highlights, and markup
- **Sharing**: Secure document sharing with permission controls
- **Approval Workflows**: Initiate and complete approval processes
- **Task Management**: Assign and monitor document-related tasks

### Security & Compliance
- **End-to-End Encryption**: AES-256 encryption for data at rest and in transit
- **Biometric Authentication**: Face ID / Touch ID support
- **Access Controls**: Role-based permissions and document-level security
- **Audit Trail**: Complete activity logging for compliance
- **Remote Wipe**: IT admin capability to remotely clear device data

## User Experience

**Intuitive Navigation**
- Swipe gestures for quick document browsing
- Split-view support for iPad multitasking
- Drag & drop for file organization
- Quick actions for common tasks

**Performance**
- Instant document preview with progressive loading
- Smart caching for frequently accessed files
- Background sync with minimal battery impact
- Optimized for large document libraries (10K+ files)

## Enterprise Integration

- **SSO Support**: SAML, OAuth, Active Directory integration
- **MDM Compatible**: Supports major Mobile Device Management platforms
- **API Access**: RESTful API for custom integrations
- **Analytics**: Usage tracking and reporting for IT admins

## Impact

Deployed across 500+ enterprise clients, managing 50M+ documents with 99.9% uptime.

projects.title: Casino Cash - Gaming Platform
projects.description: Feature-rich online gaming platform with real-money betting, multi-game support, and secure payment processing for the UK market.
projects.fullDescription:

- **Smooth Animations**: 60 FPS gameplay with Metal rendering
- **Sound Design**: Immersive audio with spatial sound effects

### User Progression
- **Level System**: Unlock new games and features as you progress
- **Achievements**: Earn badges and rewards for milestones
- **Leaderboards**: Compete with other players globally

**Responsible Gaming**

projects.title: Virtual Menu - Restaurant Ordering System
projects.description: Innovative tableside ordering platform revolutionizing the dining experience with real-time kitchen integration and seamless payment processing.
projects.fullDescription:
## Overview

Virtual Menu transforms the restaurant dining experience by enabling customers to browse menus, place orders, and pay directly from their table using iPad devices. Deployed across a major US restaurant chain.

## Customer Experience

### Digital Menu
- **Rich Media**: High-quality food photography and videos
- **Detailed Descriptions**: Ingredients, allergens, nutritional info
- **Customization**: Modify dishes with special requests
- **Recommendations**: AI-powered suggestions based on preferences
- **Multi-Language**: Support for 10+ languages

### Ordering Flow
- **Browse & Select**: Intuitive category navigation
- **Real-Time Availability**: Live menu updates based on kitchen inventory
- **Order Tracking**: Visual progress from kitchen to table
- **Modifications**: Easy order changes before kitchen preparation
- **Split Bills**: Flexible payment splitting options

### Payment Integration

**Magtek Card Reader**
- EMV chip card support
- Contactless payments (NFC)
- Magnetic stripe fallback
- PCI compliant encryption
- Instant payment confirmation

**Payment Options**
- Credit/Debit cards
- Digital wallets (Apple Pay)
- Gift cards and loyalty points
- Split payment across multiple cards
- Tip calculation with presets

## Kitchen Integration

### Order Management
- **Real-Time Sync**: Orders instantly appear on kitchen display
- **Priority Queue**: Smart order sequencing based on prep time
- **Status Updates**: Kitchen updates order status (preparing, ready, served)
- **Notifications**: Alert servers when orders are ready
- **Analytics**: Track preparation times and bottlenecks

### Inventory Management
- **Live Stock Tracking**: Automatic menu item availability updates
- **86 Items**: Quickly mark items as unavailable
- **Ingredient Alerts**: Low stock warnings
- **Waste Tracking**: Monitor and reduce food waste

## Restaurant Operations

### Staff Tools
- **Table Management**: Visual floor plan with table status
- **Server Dashboard**: Monitor all assigned tables
- **Quick Actions**: Rapid order modifications and cancellations
- **Customer Requests**: Handle special requests and assistance calls
- **Shift Reports**: Sales and performance analytics

### Management Features
- **Menu Management**: Update items, prices, and availability
- **Promotions**: Create time-based specials and discounts
- **Analytics Dashboard**: Sales trends, popular items, peak hours
- **Customer Insights**: Dining patterns and preferences
- **Multi-Location**: Centralized management for chain restaurants

## Technical Implementation

- **iPad Optimized**: Native iPad app with landscape orientation
- **Offline Resilience**: Queue orders during network outages
- **Hardware Integration**: Magtek SDK for card processing
- **WebSocket**: Real-time bidirectional communication
- **Local Database**: SQLite for offline data persistence
- **Security**: End-to-end encryption for payment data

## Business Impact

- **30% Faster Service**: Reduced order-to-kitchen time
- **25% Higher Revenue**: Increased order accuracy and upselling
- **40% Fewer Errors**: Eliminated handwriting and verbal miscommunication
- **95% Customer Satisfaction**: Positive feedback on ordering experience
- **Deployed**: 200+ restaurant locations across 15 states

## Recognition

Featured in Restaurant Technology News as 'Innovation of the Year'. Case study presented at National Restaurant Association Show.
